name: Orange
description: Oranges are a citrus fruit that are round, sweet, and juicy. They are a good source of vitamin C and other nutrients.

name: Banana
description: Bananas are a popular fruit that are high in nutrients and fiber. They can be eaten raw or cooked, and are used in many food products.

name: Grapes
description: A grape is a fruit, botanically a berry, of genus Vitis and family Vitaceae.

name: Idli
description: Idli is a soft, fluffy, savory steamed cake from South India made from fermented rice and black lentils.

name: Strawberry
description: Strawberries are rich in vitamin C, and they also contain iron and other minerals.

name: Chicken
description: The chicken is a bird that people all over the world raise for its meat, eggs, and feathers.
